name: Buffalo plaid flannel infinity scarves
description: We cannot get enough plaid this winter...we always pull out the flannels when the temperatures drop, but this year it's all plaid flannel, all the time. Yet, when we went looking for an amazing cozy and cuddly buffalo plaid infinity scarf, we came up woefully short. So...we decided to get our elves to work and sew some (for us -- and you)! Available in three colours of 100% cotton buffalo plaid flannel: red/black, grey/black, white/black, these beauties are 18" wide and about 59" in diameter. As in, they're tight enough to be cozy, loose enough to be not too tight, and drape...perfectly (what can we say, our elves are that good!).

name: Old Kinderhook Men's Soap
description: We are proud to present The Gentleman's Bar from Old Kinderhook - soap for the modern man. Available in three scents, she's a hefty beaut of a bar, handcrafted in Vancouver. Bushwick Mint Bar Spearmint, Peppermint and Eucalyptus. Great for shaving, waking up in the morning, a refreshing skin tonic, and overall balancing of the mind and spirit. (Suggested liquid accompaniment: your finest, strongest grind, first thing in the morning.) Five O'Clock Black Bar Activated Charcoal, Anise. Activated Charcoal is a natural, light exfoliant and anise is fantastic for people with oily skin. The bar is calming, sexy, and has an aura of power and sophistication. This bar is black. (Suggested liquid accompaniment: Bond-style martini or a slow sipper Glenfarclas 25 year old quarter cask.) Woodlands Forest Bar Spruce, Fir and Pine. Made with Goat's Milk. A rustic, yet fresh bar that is awesome for daily routines (as a body wash and also shampoo), shaving, and soothing dry, irritated skin. Bring home the great outdoors. (Suggested liquid accompaniment: Tall glass of Guinness.)

name: Wood & Faulk Leather Trivet
description:
Whether you're wearing it, sitting on it or using it, leather makes for some of the most beautiful products one can own. The best quality leather is strong and durable, yet ages gracefully with a lovely patina. 

These leather trivets from Wood & Faulk are no exception. The perfect size and shape, and thick enough to handle a hot coffee pot, plate or dish, but with elegant stamping. Made with US tanned bridle leather, stamped and burnished in their Portland workshop. 

Also see our matching Wood & Faulk leather coasters, available in the same colors.

Made in USA.  

Measures 6 inches square.

Available in either chestnut and black leather, either (both) of which will only get better with time.

name: Brendan Ravenhill Bottle Opener
description: There's more than meets the eye. True of so much in life, and also true of our newest product, the spare, simple-looking bottle opener from Los Angeles-based designer Brendan Ravenhill. One magnet catches the bottle cap, and the other allows the bottle opener to be hung on the fridge. Available in beech and walnut plain wood, and color-dipped: black, blue, red and white.

name: Vintage goblet soy candles - large
description: NOTE:We have only one goblet currently listed, but there are almost two dozen setting up after being poured. We will be taking them on Breakfast TV tomorrow morning (Wednesday December 18th), and will be photographing and listing them in the late afternoon on Wednesday. We have long loved the look of vintage pewter goblets, but cannot really imagine drinking wine out of them...so we decided to turn them into objets that can be used in another way and actually enjoyed as part of our (and your) decor. Our new soy candles look gorgeous in vintage pewter/silver/brass goblets, and are richly scented with an organic essential oil mix. These have a beautiful tarnished vintage patina, and a few are even engraved from previous owners (we think that makes them even better). We love soy candles as much for their gentle glow and creamy color as for the fact that soy is sustainable, while paraffin candles are derived from non-renewable petroleum resources. Soy wax is also water soluble, so once you have burned the candle down you can wash the container with hot water and use it once again. If you would prefer a refill, get in touch with us via the contact page and we will pour you a new candle for a lower fee. Also see our smaller vintage goblet soy candles, and glass goblet candles, for more beauties... Scents and containers available (keep coming back - as these ones sell, new ones will be uploaded so the listing should always be current): 1. basil, bergamot, sweet orange, rose blend in brass goblet - 5" high/3" diameter (1 only) 2. lavender, rose, rose geranium blend in brass goblet - 7" high/3" diameter (1 only) 3. basil, bergamot, sweet orange, rose blend in brass goblet - 5 3/4" high/3" diameter (1 only) 4. lavender, rose, rose geranium blend in brass goblet - 7" high/3" diameter (3 available) 5. lavender, rose, rose geranium blend in brass goblet - 6" high/3" diameter (2 available) SHIPPING NOTE -- At this time we are unable to tailor shipping fees per province or state, and just have a Canada-wide and USA-wide fee. Because of that, if there is an difference between what you pay for shipping and what we pay at the post office, you can expect a refund on shipping. We always refund overages!

name: Crackerjack 9-Hole Button Kit
description: This. Is. RAD! Take a simple white or black 1-inch button and amp up its cute factor by using its nine holes to embroider a letter, number or symbol. Give it as a gift, pin it on your wee one's backpack, or wear a few to spell out a word on your own lapel, and revel in the compliments of how very crafty and clever you are. This kit comes with needle and thread so you all you have to do is stitch. THE DETAILS The first offering from Vancouver's own Make & Mercantile! Their fine print: Our 9 hole Crackerjack buttons are designed and packaged by us (in Canada) and are made in the USA. We sew each button on to the card you will receive. All buttons are matte (no logo) on one side and glossy (logo side) on the other. You can choose which side you use.

name: Single Malt Nº16 Toothpicks
description: We'd be willing to bet that toothpicks were one of mankind's first implements -- for as long as we've been getting bits of stuff caught in our teeth, we've been digging them out with small pokey sticks. Something else we'd put our money on? These toothpicks from Daneson are the most satisfying way to get the job done. A recipe with barrel aged Islay single malt scotch from a 200 year old distillery is what makes the Single Malt Nº16 special. Unhurried, it imbues a subtle boozy peaty flavour when warmed in the mouth after several minutes. To be clear, if you're not a scotch drinker you will likely not pick up on the subtlety of a Nº 16 because it is literally soaked with premium single malt then kiln dried leaving behind flavors deep in the wood of the toothpick. Daneson founder Peter Smith puts it best: "A toothpick is more than just a toothpick. With the right recipe a Daneson can bring back memories, relax the mind, complete a meal or distinguish a character." They come packaged in an amber glass vial to preserve flavors and integrity of the oils, topped by a cork stopper to seal in the goodness. Each bottle has a minimum of 12 toothpicks but you might get a bonus one or two as well.

name: Studiopatró Tea Towels
description: We have a thing for tea towels in our Delish household...we've collected from Europe, from Grandma's house, and from just about any shop we have visited that makes us feel happy. Imagine our delight, then, when we discovered Studiopatró's collection. It was an instantaneous attraction, and the fervent hope that we could add several to our stash. In a true win-win, it turns out the studio is based in San Francisco, one of our top five favorite cities in the world. We emailed the fine folks at Studiopatró when our order arrived to pay our finest compliment yet: "It's like San Francisco in a box!". Crafted of 100% linen, these towels start out beautiful and get even more so with regular use and washing. Available now: TODAY IS A GOOD DAY - copper ink on oatmeal linen (We love this one as a wall hanging - attached is an image from this summer's pop-up shop, taken by Jacqueline Greenaway of Fixate Photography.) STRIPES MAKE EVERYTHING BETTER - slate ink on oatmeal linen, copper ink on oyster linen JUST DOTS - slate ink on oatmeal EVERYDAY STRIPE - Noir ink (a deep, dark grey) on oatmeal COLANDER NOIR - Noir ink (a deep, dark grey) on oatmeal COLANDER BLANC - Blanc ink (a creamy white) on oatmeal EQUAL - copper ink on rustic oatmeal Also see our raspberry CAKE and JUST DOTS set of Studiopatró towels.

options.name: STRIPES MAKE EVERYTHING BETTER - slate ink
STRIPES MAKE EVERYTHING BETTER - copper ink

name: Beer Growler (64oz)
description: The Portland Growler Company knows growlers. It's all there in their name, yes, but it's also obvious in the product. These growlers are big, brawny and beautiful all at once. Designed and manufactured in Portland, OR the growlers are slip cast by hand with the necks carefully trimmed on the potters’ wheel for the tightest of lid fit. They’re cast thick to hold in the cold. The wide mouth ceramic flip top lid with rubber gasket will seal in carbonation keeping your liquids (whatever they may be) cold and crisp for days. Beer lovers, bring your growler to a local craft brewery and you can get it filled for under $10. Kombucha and kefir makers, this is a perfect vessel to store your fermented drinks. Anyone else - you too can enjoy the benefits of the growler and look completely cool at the same time. THE DETAILS The growler is 11" x 5.75" and weighs 4.5 lbs. Looking for something smaller? Check out the Growlette. **LOCAL LOWER MAINLAND CUSTOMERS** Email us via the contact page to arrange for free (if you can make it to the North Shore), or cheap (we're talking $5-10) delivery.

description: We have a thing for tea towels in our Delish household...we've collected from Europe, from Grandma's house, and from just about any shop we have visited that makes us feel happy. Imagine our delight, then, when we discovered Studiopatró's collection. It was an instantaneous attraction, and the fervent hope that we could add several to our stash. We emailed the fine folks at Studiopatró when our order arrived to pay our finest compliment yet: "It's like San Francisco in a box!". Crafted of 100% linen, these towels start out beautiful and get even more so with regular use and washing. This listing is for a set of two towels, regular $26 each. Perfect for the person in your life who loves pink, cake, and being in the kitchen (and for the record, she sounds like our kinda woman!)... PIECE OF CAKE and JUST DOTS both feature raspberry ink on oyster linen and measure 18" x 26". See our other Studiopatró towels in another listing., for more of their linen-y (that's totally a real word...) goodness.

name: Wood bowl -- hand turned Maple (raw edge)
description:
Introducing a partnership between Delish General Store and Yarrow Turning Works, to bring you the Wood Shop.

This lovely hand turned Maple bowl measures 3" high and 4 3/4 " wide or 7.6 cm x 12 cm, and has a beautiful natural raw edge.

It would be beautiful as a catch-all of any sort, a jewelry holder in the dressing room, business card holder on your desk, bowl for nuts, trail mix or snack on the table or simply an exquisite objet to admire for its natural beauty and fine craftsmanship. 

Each piece is one-of-a-kind and beautifully produced by Peter Nowakowsky, who is the father of Delish General Store's proprietor and e-shopkeeper, Tamara Komuniecki. Inscribed on the bottom is the type of wood, "Petern" and "YTW".

name: Daneson Birch Wood Toothpicks
description: We'd be willing to bet that toothpicks were one of mankind's first implements -- for as long as we've been getting bits of stuff caught in our teeth, we've been digging them out with small pokey sticks. Something else we'd put our money on? These toothpicks from Daneson are the most satisfying way to get the job done. Blends of essential oils and natural flavors infuse the Northern White Birch toothpicks and make them so nice to have in your mouth that their use extends well beyond the obvious. Daneson founder Peter Smith puts it best: "A toothpick is more than just a toothpick. With the right recipe a Daneson can bring back memories, relax the mind, complete a meal or distinguish a character." They come packaged in an amber glass vial to preserve flavors and integrity of the oils. Each bottle has a minimum of 12 toothpicks but you might get a bonus one or two as well. Flavors available: Mint Nº 9 is a blend of natural oils from several mint varieties along with peppermint, and a touch of wintergreen with sweet fennel. CinnaMint Nº 7 combine the traditional flavor of cinnamon with a subtle hint of raw mint, creating a sweet sensation that blends nicely with the warming heat of cinnamon. Lemon Nº 11 California lemon essential oil meets a mix of other herbs, and the result is Amalfi, gin and tonic and lemonade blended as one.

name: Vintage milk glass Irish Coffee mugs
description: We have a feeling that it will be very difficult to let go of some of the awesome vintage items that we or our extended team of hunters have come across. This is 100% true with this, our first offering in our new DGS Vintage section. We know we can't keep it all, and we've already kept a few things we had planned to sell (shhh!), so we're putting these up for sale in case anyone has the perfect spot for them. When we see these, we envision a group of friends sipping Irish Coffee by a roaring fire while cuddling up under a Hudson's Bay blanket, watching the snow fall outside the cabin window. But if you want to get them to drink tea while at work, or beer while watching curling from Sochi 2014 on TV, we won't mind! There are four sweet ode-to-curling (HURRY HARD!), gold foil decorated, milk glass Irish Coffee mugs in this set, and all are in mint condition. SHIPPING NOTE -- At this time we ar unable to tailor shipping fees per province or state, and just have a Canada-wide and USA-wide fee. Because of that, if there is an difference between what you pay for shipping and what we pay at the post office, you can expect a refund on shipping. We always refund overages!

name: Dynaware Pyr-o-Rey Individual Milk Glass Oven Dishes
description:
We stumbled across these little beauties and knew we had found something special...

We have a set of six, but decided to list them in three groups of two, so we could spread the love. Interested in all six? Get in touch via our contact page for a better deal!

These are beautiful vintage 1960's Dynaware individual milk glass oven & casserole dishes.

We recommend them for shepherd's pie (feel free to request our recipe!), individual servings of homemade mac & cheese, French onion soup, stews and pot pies, as well as baked desserts.

If the flawless milk glass isn't enough, we're in love with the vintage 1960s brown daisy & leaf design.

Made of fully oven safe Dynaware

Measurements:
- 2.5" tall
- 2 1/4" deep
- 4.5" diameter
- 14" around
- 16 ounce or 2 cups capacity each

SHIPPING NOTE -- At this time we ar unable to tailor shipping fees per province or state, and just have a Canada-wide and USA-wide fee. name: Twig push pins - small - set of four
description: These push pins are fashioned by hand out of cherry tree branches, and bring just the right amount of Canadiana to your walls. **Price is for four small push pins.** The wood part measures about 5/8 of an inch, and the pin measures 1/2 inch. See also our medium size twig push pins, which are 1 1/2 inch total length - wood & pin. See them in use in this photo from our pop-up shop! (Photo courtesy of Jacqueline Greenaway, Fixate Photography.) These will ship wrapped in tissue & bubble wrap, in a small box.

name: Twig push pins - medium - set of two
description: These push pins are fashioned by hand out of cherry tree branches, and bring just the right amount of Canadiana to your walls. **Price is for two medium push pins.** The wood part measures 3/4 of an inch, and the pin measures the same. See also our small size twig push pins, which are one inch total length - wood & pin. See them in use in this photo from our pop-up shop! (Photo courtesy of Jacqueline Greenaway, Fixate Photography.) These will ship wrapped in tissue & bubble wrap, in a small box.

name: Frosted Jar Lantern with Daisy Lid
description:
Our new frosted jar lanterns are paired with a daisy lid - add a tea light (perhaps one of our scented or unscented soy tea lights!) for a soft and romantic glow that won't blow out if used outside. 

Available options include: 
JAR: 8 oz square jar, 8oz quilted jar
LID: antique pewter, antique gold, rustic bronze, gold

name: Beeswax 8-inch taper pair
description:
Brand new from Bees Wax Works -- an 8-inch pair of beeswax taper candles. (See also our beeswax 10-inch and 12-inch tapers, and our beeswax tea lights.)

Some information about beeswax:
Our 100% Canadian beeswax is sourced from various apiaries in British Columbia and Alberta. The wax has been filtered only to remove debris. The colour of the wax alters by what blossoms the bees have been pollinating. Bees Wax Works strives to use the purest wax possible; we use no additives, fragrances, fillers or colouring agents. The scent of our wax is simply pure.

Beeswax is a renewable resource.

name: Soy tea lights
description:
Our handmade soy tea lights burn cleanly and slowly, giving hours of enjoyment. 

The scented candles feature beautiful organic essential oils.

We love soy candles as much for their gentle glow and creamy color as for the fact that soy is sustainable, while paraffin candles are derived from non-renewable petroleum resources.

Six in a package, buy them to fill your own candle holders or use them in our new frosted lantern jars with daisy lids for a soft, glowing effect.

name: Sea Salt Soap
description: Swedish Sea Salt Soap smells, as our three-year-old says, fwesh. The rejuvenating scent is the first thing you'll notice when you take the soap out of the box...but be prepared to be really impressed when you start to use it. More than a made-up name or story to create a fake legend behind the brand, this soap really does come from sea water. The benefits of its mineral rich salts are an invigorating and refreshing shower (it says so right on the box!), a lovely lather for a skin-healthy shave, and softening effects on the skin as well. It's our new go-to in the shower and for shaving, and we're so happy to share it with you. 129g/4.5oz

name: Eggwhite Facial Soap
description:
Belgische Schoonheid...

Pardon?

I said...Belgian Beauty.

Just like our new Swedish Sea Salt Soap, the first thing you'll notice about the new Belgian Eggwhite Facial Soap with Chamomile Flowers and Lecithin, is its gorgeous scent. Delicately floral, it is fresh and feminine, and -- yippee! -- the results are amazing. 

It makes sense, though. We drink Chamomile tea for its calming effects, and this soap has much the same effect on the skin. It softens, calms and conditions. The oil's soothing and hydrating properties combined with the protein-rich power of fresh eggwhites helps you to maintain a clear, glowing complexion with daily use.  

Directions: Work up a good lather and then smooth the protein-rich egg white foam on the face and neck and let it stay for 5 minutes. Enjoy the tightening effect of the egg whites, knowing that the chamomile tea is soothing and softening your skin at the same time. Rinse. Glow!

1.85oz

SOLD OUT! NEW SHIPMENT EXPECTED WEEK OF MAY 27

name: Sunflower Facial Soap
description:
Delicately and deliciously scented Swedish Dream Sunflower Facial Soaps are made from sunflower oil and evening primrose oil. The extract from sunflower seeds is a rich emollient high in essential fatty acids. Paired with evening primrose oil, a rare super-emollient skin nutrient, the benefits extend to those with very dry or aged facial skin. 

Women with regular complexions and no premature aging can also benefit from the weekly use of this soap, as a spa-at-home facial treatment.

1.8oz

name: Buncha Farmer's Stain Remover Stick
description:
It has been touted in the media and public/user reviews as a miracle worker when it comes to all kinds of stains, and we can attest to the power of the Buncha Farmer's Stain Remover Stick! 

The stick is easy to use - just wet and rub into whatever stain you are trying to beat: wine, food, grease, blood, underarm, underwear, under here, under there...

Seriously though, not only is it incredibly effective at getting rid of new and old stains on your clothing, you can also use it in other areas like your vehicle seats, fabric furniture, leather and suede, carpet, refrigerator, countertops, floors, walls and whatever else you have stained. And we do NOT want to know how that happened!

No chemical detergents to bother your skin, system and the ecosystem - Buncha Farmers All Natural Stain Remover is real soap. It’s made with all-natural, biodegradable ingredients, and enhanced with borax to soften the water and aid the cleaning process. There are no artificial dyes or perfumes, just the fresh, clean scent of natural eucalyptus and the deodorizing power of litsea. It will not discolour clothes or fabrics. 

NOTE: If you encounter a very stubborn stain like blueberry or a baked in stain, you might have to apply the stain remover a couple of times or work at it by hand. It should start to fade and fade until you get it out.

TIPS: 
*Cut or scrape off a little of the bar and throw in with your regular wash, it will energize your laundry load. 
*Works Great with Soap Nuts! 
*Clean your shoes or remove ink off your leather jacket or purse. 
*Melt a little bit in hot water (usually when you do this just use about ¼ to ½ inch of the bar and melt in a pail a quarter full of hot water) and use it to scrub your granite or countertop.      
*The hot water solution is also good for cleaning tiles, bath tubs, toilet bowls, sinks, even your tile or linoleum floors.
*Removes mold from surfaces, especially in your fridge. 
*IT IS ALWAYS BEST TO USE HOT WATER WHEN USING BY HAND OR PREPPING FOR THE WASH!

name: Albatros bookmark
description:
Book lovers unite! iPads, Kindles and e-readers of all kinds may be all the rage today but we are firm believers in the power of print (funny as that may sound, coming from the creators of the born-on-the-interwebs online Delish Magazine). If you are like us and enjoy the smell and texture of a page in your fingers and the heft of a book in your hand (to say nothing of how handsome it looks on your bedside table or bookshelf), then this brand new product is for you. The Albatros bookmark lets you get lost in the pages of your favorite book...without getting lost in the pages of your favorite book. It is a new kind of bookmark that follows your reading. Each time you turn a page, the bookmark inserts itself at the right place. Now when you are done reading, you can simply close up the book and walk away...and when you are ready, pick it up right where you left off. The Albatros was invented and designed by Oscar Lhermitte -- designed in England, made in France, and Delish General Store is proud to be the first Canadian e-tailer/retailer to stock it. The price is $12.50, per pack of 6 bookmarks (one each of red, orange, yellow, green, blue and pink). The video below shows the Albatros in action and illustrates its brilliantly simple and simply brilliant design.

Albatros bookmarks from Oscar Lhermitte on Vimeo.

name: Speckled Ceramic Camp Mug
description:
Keep your good memories of camping alive even when working at your desk, with this super duper heavy speckled ceramic camp mug. Call it the city version of the old-fashioned enamel camp mug...smoke scent from the campfire not included.

It's a good size - as in, perfect for a Monday morning coffee and generous enough for a man. (Think: three finger handle big!)

Dishwasher and microwave safe.

Measurements: 
4 inches diameter 
3.5 inches high
Capacity: 15 oz.

name: Stainless Steel Clip
description: Holy handy, Batman! Potentially the handiest little helper in all of Delish General Store, these wonderful stainless steel clips can be used all around the house, shop and more. Made from one continuous piece of 18/8 stainless steel wire, this clip is perfect in the laundry room, in your office, in the kitchen (both the cupboards and the oven) and wherever, and for whatever else you can think of. Measures: 2.75" x 5/8"/7cm x 1.5cm﻿﻿

name: Freekey
description:
What is the Freekey and why have you never heard of it before?

For anyone who has ever broken a fingernail or gotten completely frustrated at attempting the supposedly simple task of taking a key off a keyring, we are pleased to introduce our newest product! The Freekey is a small, elegantly designed and inexpensive solution to this common problem, and Delish General Store was the first Canadian store (online or bricks-and-mortar) to carry it.

How does it work? Softly press the FREEKey logo and it easily opens to allow keys to be inserted or removed quickly and effortlessly. Simple yet innovative, our favorite kind of product to introduce to you.

This Freekey, made of heat treated stainless steel, is designed to hold up to six keys. Have more than that? See the Freekey System in our e-store, which includes 3 mini rings, and can hold 6 or more keys.

name: Freekey System
description:
What is the Freekey and why have you never heard of it before?

For anyone who has ever broken a fingernail or gotten completely frustrated at attempting the supposedly simple task of taking a key off a keyring, we are pleased to introduce our newest product! The Freekey is a small, elegantly designed and inexpensive solution to this common problem, and Delish General Store was the first Canadian store (online or bricks-and-mortar) to carry it.

How does it work? Softly press the FREEKey logo and it easily opens to allow keys to be inserted or removed quickly and effortlessly. Simple yet innovative, our favorite kind of product to introduce to you.

The Freekey System, made of heat treated stainless steel, comes with 3 mini rings. The System is designed to hold over six keys. A bit too heavy duty for you? The Freekey holds up to 5 keys and is also available in our store.

name: NEW! Stainless Steel Ice Cube Tray
description:
There's a good reason that products from the good old (pre-plastic) days are coming back into daily use. They were well made, toxin-free, and easy to use.  
 
Enter...our new Stainless Steel Ice Cube Trays! Made from 18/8 stainless steel, this two part system goes back to the trays of 1950s.

In addition to being great for ice cubes, it also works extremely well for baby food with each section making the perfect single portion.

If you need more than one tray, be sure to look for our stainless steel ice cube tray stand.

100% recyclable

name: NEW! Stainless Steel Ice Cube Tray Stand
description:
This stand fits our new stainless steel ice cube trays. 

Fit two or three trays on for great ice cubes and even individual baby food portions.

name: Stainless Steel Mug
description:
Our new double walled stainless steel mug does its job (which is to say, keeping hot things hot and cold things cold), and does it beautifully.  

Made from 18/8 stainless steel, this mug has 8oz capacity. Its smaller size is perfect for women and works great for little ones as well.

Dishwasher safe.﻿

name: Stainless Steel Tumbler
description:
If you like our stainless steel mug for your hot bevvies, this is perfect to sip your cold drinks out of.

It's got a 9oz capacity, is made of 18/8 stainless steel, and has a special rolled lip. No sharp edges and its small diameter also make it perfect for little hands and a great transition drinking cup when your small person is growing out of his or her sippy cup and you are not ready to introduce glass just yet.

It's also great for the bathroom too. 

Tumbler measures 4 inches in height.﻿

name: 8cm Airtight Stainless Steel Container
description:
The 8cm airtight/leakproof food storage container is the perfect little container for baby food or a snack, and a great condiment container for camping, picnic or work. 

They are made from #316 (18/10) food grade stainless steel, and the lid has a silicone seal.  

You can write on the container with a non-permanent or China marker, to help to specify the contents, date and owner. 

The bottom part of the container can be washed in the dishwasher, but the lid is not dishwasher or oven safe. Made in Korea.﻿

Capacity: 140 ml/0.6 cups.

Available in six different sizes: 8, 10, 12, 14, 16 and 18cm.

description:

Available in six different sizes: 8, 10, 12, 14, 16 and 18cm.

name: Stainless Steel Divided Airtight Food Storage Container
description:

It is made from #316 (18/10) food grade stainless steel, and the lid has a silicone seal.

You can write on the container with a non-permanent or China marker, to help to specify the contents, date and owner.

The bottom part of the container can be washed in the dishwasher, but the lid is not dishwasher or oven safe. Made in Korea.﻿

name: Stainless Steel Sandwich Box
description:
This is a single layer stainless steel sandwich box with a plastic cover, perfect for throwing into a school bag or briefcase.

Measurements:
16 x 12 x 4.5 cm 
6.3 x 4.7 x 2 in﻿ches

name: Stainless Steel Two-Layer Sandwich Box (Medium)
description:
Perfect for lunch, this two layer box can fit a layer of fruit or veggies on top (grapes, strawberries, sliced apples or celery and carrot sticks) on top, and a sandwich on the bottom. 

You can also write on the container with a non-permanent marker! This helps to specify what is inside, when it was packed, and who it belongs to! (You could always write a little love note too...)

Measurements:
15.9 x 11.3 x 6.2 cm

Specifications:
18/0 (#430) food grade stainless steel﻿

name: Stainless Steel Two-Layer Sandwich Box (Large)
description:
Perfect for lunch, this is the LARGE size of the two layer stainless steel boxes, and can fit a layer of fruit or veggies/salads on top, and a nice-sized sandwich on the bottom.

You can also write on the container with a non-permanent marker! This helps to specify what is inside, when it was packed, and who it belongs to! (You could always write a little love note too...)

Measurements:
17.5 x 13 x 6.2 cm

Specifications:
18/0 (#430) food grade stainless steel﻿

name: Stainless Steel Double Layer Food Storage Container
description:
Perfect for hot or cold lunches, this double walled, split level stainless steel food storage container is lightweight and durable.

You can also write on the container with a non-permanent marker! This helps to specify what is inside, when it was packed, and who it belongs to! (You could always write a little love note too...)

Measurements:
14cm diameter

Specifications:
18/0 (#430) food grade stainless steel﻿
100% reusable and recyclable. 

Not recommended for the dishwasher.

name: Stainless Steel Two-Layer Tiffin
description:
We are jumping on the Tiffin wagon! New to Delish General Store, the tiffin is a layered, double walled food storage system, that will keep your food hot or cold for hours! 

Perfect for school, work or picnics. Easy to clean, easy to use. 

It is made from #202 food grade Stainless Steel. 
Measurements: 14cm/5.5" in diameter﻿.

Also available are our three-layer Tiffins.

name: Stainless Steel Three-Layer Tiffin
description:
We are jumping on the Tiffin wagon! New to Delish General Store, the tiffin is a layered, double walled food storage system, that will keep your food hot or cold for hours! 

Perfect for school, work or picnics. Easy to clean, easy to use. 

It is made from #202 food grade Stainless Steel. 
Measurements: 14cm/5.5" in diameter﻿.

Also available are our two-layer Tiffins.

name: Stainless Steel Ice Pop Mold
description: Okay, we're not going to pretend this isn't an...eye catching contraption (you should see the looks it gets sitting on the table at markets!)...but it is something you will be SO glad you got when the warm temperatures hit! These stainless steel ice pop mold have a ton of advantages over plastic: faster to freeze, easier to clean, no plasticky taste, will not get misshapen from use, and will last you a lifetime. Designed so that one ice pop can be removed (or re-filled) at a time, and with a drip catcher for clean enjoyment of potentially messy treats. To remove the treat, simply hold the mold in your hand for a moment, or run under warm water briefly. (Not too long, it will release very quickly.) Each set comes with one stand, 6 molds, 6 lids, 12 reusable bamboo sticks and 12 removable silicone rings. The rings ensure proper stick placement -- no more tilted, sunken or popped-out sticks. Recipe idea: layer mushed up and stewed blueberries, then strawberries, and finally Greek yogurt for a healthy, homemade rocket!

name: Stainless Steel Children's Cutlery Set
description:
This is Finn-tested and approved! (He's the little guy behind Delish General Store Mama...)

Officially the best child's cutlery set ever! 

Made from 18/8 stainless steel, the set will last forever. The four-piece cutlery set includes a fork, a knife and two spoons. The smaller of the two spoons is perfect for babies just starting on solid food. Our fork and spoons are rounded, which not only holds the food better, but fits better in a child's mouth. (Think: a teeny shovel!) 

Each piece is plain, so if you want you can engrave your child's name, birthdate. or anything else on it﻿.

name: Beer Growlette (32oz)
description: The Portland Growler Company knows growlers. It's all there in their name, yes, but it's also obvious in the product. These growlers are big, brawny and beautiful all at once. Now, make no mistake -- the growlette has half the capacity of its big brother the Growler, but it's no slouch. Designed and manufactured in Portland, OR the growlers are slip cast by hand with the necks carefully trimmed on the potters’ wheel for the tightest of lid fit. They’re cast thick to hold in the cold. The wide mouth ceramic flip top lid with rubber gasket will seal in carbonation keeping your liquids (whatever they may be) cold and crisp for days. Beer lovers, bring your growler to a local craft brewery and you can get it filled for under $10. Kombucha and kefir makers, this is a perfect vessel to store your fermented drinks. Anyone else - you too can enjoy the benefits of the growler and look completely cool at the same time. (And you get to be extra fashionable when you drop words like "growlette".) THE DETAILS The growlette is 9" x 4.25" and weighs about 3 lbs. Looking for something with a bit more heft? Check out the Growler. **LOCAL LOWER MAINLAND CUSTOMERS** Email us via the contact page to arrange for free (if you can make it to the North Shore), or cheap (we're talking $5-10) delivery.

name: Mason Shaker
description:
Inspired by the classic southern icon, the Mason jar, the Mason Shaker by W&P Design is a unique four-piece cocktail shaker that harkens to American eras past. 

Materials: Glass, high quality stainless steel and a shot of southern sensibility

Includes 32 oz Ball mason jar + 3 piece stainless steel lid.  Lid fits regular size mason jar.

The Mason Shaker® is a unique Mason Jar cocktail shaker created by W&P Design, a design and manufacturing firm founded by two best friends raised in the south. The concept for the Mason Shaker® was developed from an obsession with vintage kitchenware (Josh) and an uncanny ability to fashion impromptu drinking tools at a moment’s notice (Eric). After one too many mint juleps poured from a poorly-modified Mason Jar one summer, the idea for a better (and cooler) cocktail shaker hit us like a double shot of bourbon. The Mason Shaker® was born.

W&P Design
Based out of Brooklyn, NY, W & P Design creates products inspired by combined passions for vintage Americana, southern sensibility, and New York industrialism. From our workshop to your countertop, we strive to bring you unique goods that pay tribute to both bygone American eras and modern usability, while staying true to our Southern roots.

name: Wood & Faulk Leather Coasters
description:
Just like our new Wood & Faulk leather trivets, these coasters will elevate your abode to stylish, simply by laying about and doing their job. 

Made with US tanned bridle leather, they are available in the same colors as the trivet: chestnut and black. 

3.75" square.  

Made in USA.

name: Eco Clean Bottle Brush
description:
This brush is perfect for cleaning into hard-to-reach places like the very bottom of glasses, bottles and jars. (These are great for the Weck juice jars, coming very soon to the shop!)

It's known as the Eco Clean Brush because its bristles are made out of  tampico plant fibers, that come from the Agave plant in Mexico. The bristles are soft to medium texture and are highly resistant to liquids, solvents, and heat (that's why you'll often see tampico brushes are car washes). The handle is made of bamboo.

name: Bamboo Pot Scrapers
description:
Great for pots, but that's not all. Use it to scrape windshields, remove dried candle wax, shimmy a chair, or round up loose dirt on a potting bench. Like all good things, you’re limited only by your imagination. 

Hand-crafted from Certified organic bamboo with a different shape in each corner to get into a variety of spots. Fits perfectly in your hand.

Measures: 2 3/4"

*Removes stubborn foods and other substances safely without scratching cooking surfaces
*Lightweight and stronger than wood
*Natural food-safe oil finish
   
We recommend Bamboo Goo to keep your bamboo beautiful for years, and will be stocking it soon.

name: Wood & Faulk Leather Jar Sleeve
description:
These new leather jar sleeves will keep your hands cool and your coffee warm. Fashioned of a rugged English bridle leather, they are designed to fit half-pint mason jars, and do so incredibly stylishly. 

Available in chestnut and black, same colors as the Wood & Faulk trivet and coasters.

name: PLAID Faribault Mill Wool Coffee Cup/Jar Cozy
description:
We wear and wrap ourselves in wool from Faribault Woolen Mill, so why not use it to keep our hot bevvies warm and our hands from getting burned?

These 100% natural wool cup/jar cozies are made from blanket ends that would otherwise be shredded.

Permanently moth-proofed. Best to wash by hand as is 100% pure wool.

The cozies fit well onto a standard take-away cup, fairly well onto our 12oz quilted jar, and nice and snug on our large, wide mouth 24 and 16oz wide mouth jars.

Available in this listing in assorted plaids - see our solid cup/jar cozy listing for, you guessed it, solid colors!

name: Faribault Mill Wool Coffee Cup/Jar Cozy
description:
We wear and wrap ourselves in wool from Faribault Woolen Mill, so why not use it to keep our hot bevvies warm and our hands from getting burned?

These 100% natural wool cup/jar cozies are made from blanket ends that would otherwise be shredded.

Permanently moth-proofed. Best to wash by hand as is 100% pure wool.

name: Sprouting Screen - Stainless Steel Mesh (fits wide mouth jar)
description:
Our new stainless steel sprouting screens fit on wide mouth jars, so you can start your sprouting garden right in your kitchen!

The screen comes on a card with basic jar sprouting instructions.

name: Sprout Lids for Wide Mouth Jar
description:
Are you interested in joining the movement to grow healthful, natural foods in your own home? Start with sprouts! They are easy to grow and pack a powerful nutritional punch.

These lids from Sprout House are made of BPA-free plastic, and fit a wide mouth jar (see our selection for small and large wide mouth jars). Featuring a small mesh pattern the lid is perfect for a jar garden - sprout your own tiny seeds into something yummy in no time. 

Instructions for use come right on the package.

Hand wash only.

name: Mason Bar topper
description:
The newest addition to our jar toppers collection is this great BPA-free plastic topper that turns a canning jar into a sealed drinking vessel.

Dishwasher safe, made in the USA.

Available in wide mouth and regular...make sure to check out our great selection of jars to find your fit. (Jar mugs, regular mouth  quilted 12oz jars, regular mouth square mason jars 16oz., wide mouth jars, etc.)

NOTE: This listing is for the topper only. The topper does not come with a straw. Please see our selection of stainless steel straws that work well with the Mason Bar!

categories.name: BNTOs, Cuppows, EcoJarz, reCAPs, Mason Bars

name: reCAP Mason Jar Pour Cap/Lid wide mouth BLACK
description:
The brand new, BLACK version of the reCAP has made it into our store! Available in black only in wide mouth, the reCAP is the same great product as the pewter-colored ones that were seen in the August issue of Canadian House & Home!

It is spill-proof and great for liquids:
*make, shake and take salad dressing
*maple syrup
*honey
*Bond-style shaken, not stirred cocktails
*drink cups for kids and adults alike

the pantry/BBQs/camping:
*sugar 
*instant coffee grounds

*enjoy drinks in a clean glass jar, and keep sand, bugs and more out!  

These reCAPs fit wide mouth mason jars -- see the smaller pewter-colored ones for regular mouth jars.

They are made of BPA-free number “5″ Polypropylene plastic.  This new color is the chic black! 

SHIPPING NOTE -- it's super cheap to send these out to B.C. customers from our North Vancouver office, but more expensive to the East coast. So far we're unable to tailor shipping fees per province and just have a Canada-wide fee. Because of that, if there is an difference between what you pay for shipping and what we pay at the post office, you can expect a refund on shipping. We always refund overages!

name: EcoJarz
description:
EcoJarz are stainless steel drink tops, designed to fit standard and wide mouth canning jars. 

The stainless steel is high quality and strong, and the lid features an FDA-approved silicone gasket under the rim to prevent leakage.

VANCOUVER, BC AND AREA customers -- it's super cheap to send these to you but more expensive to the East coast. So far we're unable to tailor shipping fees per province and just have a Canada-wide fee. Because of that, you can expect a minimum $2 refund on shipping if you order only these.

name: Cuppow Regular
description:
Meet the Cuppow regular mouth, little sister to the original Cuppow wide mouth. Both are BPA-free toppers that turn a canning jar into a travel mug. 

This size fits most regular mouth jars, and it features STRAW TREK! Now you can enjoy your beverage of choice through a straw.

This Cuppow is also much better for kids. A revamped spout section features an elongated spout to make it more comfortable for them to drink out of. 

Make sure to look for our wool and leather jar sleeves coming soon in the e-shop, and check out our jars that fit the Cuppow regular - an 8oz square mason jar, a 16oz square mason jar, and our 16oz drinking mug mason jar.

VANCOUVER, BC AND AREA customers -- it's super cheap to send these to you but more expensive to the East coast. So far we're unable to tailor shipping fees per province and just have a Canada-wide fee. Because of that, you can expect a minimum $2 refund on shipping if you order only Cuppows.

categories.name: BNTOs, Cuppows, EcoJarz, reCAPs, Mason Bars

name: Cuppow
description:
Get on the Cuppow wagon, baby! This is the ingenious BPA-free topper that turns a wide mouth canning jar into a travel mug. Works equally well for hot (coffee, tea, hot chocolate), cold (Bloody Mary, Screwdriver, juice) and healthy (smoothie) bevvies, as well as any other drink of choice.

Invented by two Massachusetts-based friends who were tired of over-built and expensive travel mugs or leaky and hot disposable paper cups, the Cuppow is now manufactured in the U-S of A.

Make sure to look for our handmade jar cozies coming soon in the e-shop, and check out our jars to fit the cuppow - a 16oz wide mouth jar, and the Big Gulp, a 24oz wide mouth jar. (The Cuppow and large jar combo has been popular with smoothie lovers...)

We also have the brand spanking new regular mouth Cuppows available, as well. Because we are cool like that.

VANCOUVER, BC AND AREA customers -- it's super cheap to send these to you but more expensive to the East coast. So far we're unable to tailor shipping fees per province and just have a Canada-wide fee. Because of that, you can expect a minimum $2 refund on shipping if you order only Cuppows.

categories.name: BNTOs, Cuppows, EcoJarz, reCAPs, Mason Bars

name: NEW! BNTO Jar Lunchbox Adapter
description:
Separate your wet from your dry, your sauce from your pasta, your dip from your chips. What's wet stays wet and what's dry stays dry, until the blessed event of their union...

This is a brand new, why-didn't-I-think-of-that, crazy handy invention from the makers of Cuppow!

Here are some details: 
*6-ounce/ 3/4 cup BNTO lunchbox adaptor for use with a wide mouth canning jar (jar sold separately).
 *Made from BPA/BPS-free rigid plastic. Reusable and dishwasher safe (top rack only!).
 *Product and Packaging made in the USA, from 100% recycled materials.
*BNTO (ben-toh) is our newest canning jar adapter for bringing great food with you on the go! We took inspiration from Japanese bento boxes and created a conveniently shaped insert that separates a canning jar into two compartments so you can mix or dip like a champ. 

**We are in the process of figuring out our shipping costs, and so anyone who overpays will be refunded the difference. Miscalculations that result in us having to top up $ to send the package to you, are our responsibility. Our current store shipping "software" has some limitations and we are working on it!**

categories.name: BNTOs, Cuppows, EcoJarz, reCAPs, Mason Bars

name: Colored Mason Jar Lid
description:
These colored Plastisol mason jar lids fit regular-sized mason jars with 2 3/4" diameter threads (G70).

Note: These lids are not designed for water bath processing. Only for hot fill product sealing. Cute for topping jars used for storage and crafting!

name: Coin Slot Mason Jar Lid
description:
Put this lid on a mason jar and transform it into a piggy bank! The combo would make a nice gift for a young person saving up for something special, or just a great thing to have around the house to collect all that loose change.

These lids fit most regular sized jelly, pint or quart sized jars(2 3/4″ dia. threads). Does not fit wide mouth jars.  

This is an unlined aluminum colored tin/steel lid and is not for food use.

name: Daisy Mason Jar Lids, set of 5
description:
Finishes available: antique pewter, antique gold, gold, bronze.

There are so many uses for these cute lids!
*Fill a standard-mouth jar with your favorite beverage, and top it with a Daisy lid and one of our paper straws (cocktail straws are great for small jars, regular sized straws for bigger jars). Perfect for back yard BBQs, the beach, baby and wedding showers, and parties of all kinds. Our paper drinking straws fit in the center hole very securely, and more loosely in the petal tip holes.
*Put a votive candle inside and the lid on top for inside the house, and absolutely perfect for holding any kind of candle (like citronella -- take that, mosquitoes!) outside, as the lid will prevent the wind from blowing out the flame. 
*Use as a shaker with parm cheese and/or red pepper flakes for a pizza party!
*Bakers - use the lid on top of a jar of flour to re-flour your work surface, or icing sugar to decorate the tops of goodies.
*Use as a shaker for bath salts in the tub.
*Use the top holes to insert flowers into for an instant arrangement.
*Also wonderful for a jar full of potpourri. You get the scent without the potential for mess, or accidental nibbling by pets and kids. (HA!)
*Crafters - we haven't forgotten about you! Insert a spool of baker's twine, yarn or string into a jar (our 16oz square jar is perfect), and thread it through one of the petals, affixing the lid on top. No more spools rolling around the floor!

These lids fit most regular sized jelly, pint or quart sized jars( 2 3/4″ dia. threads (70G450)). Does not fit wide mouth jars. See options in our jar section.

Made in the USA out of tin with food safe finish.

This is the price for 5 Daisy lids.

name: Lug Button Lids
description:
Lug Style Button Lid in Plastisol 

This lid fits jars requiring twist-on lug lids. This is the lid that fits on our Honey Bear jar!

Also available in gold, silver and coin slot top, which is in a separate listing.

name: Lug Coin Slot Gold Lid
description:
Put this lid on a jar and transform it into a piggy bank! The combo would make a nice gift for a young person saving up for something special, or just a great thing to have around the house to collect all that loose change.

Pair with our Honey Bear Jar and you have a sweet piggy bank for a child.

This lid fits jars requiring twist-on lug lids.

name: Ball 4oz Quilted Crystal Jars

Our quilted jars come in three sizes, and this is the medium size.

*Add a reCAP and it's perfect for taking salad dressing with your salad, to work or for a picnic.

name: Ball 12oz Quilted Jar
description:
Can a jar be beautiful? We sure think so...and if it can, this one is.

We're using them as travel mugs with our Cuppow, EcoJarz, reCAP and Mason Bar toppers, and find them easier for a smaller hand to hold...either for women or kids. 

These jars are also a particularly pretty and effective solution for string, twine or yarn management in a crafting centre, when paired with our daisy lids (antique gold or antique pewter).

They are also going to go into high rotation come canning season around here, because they do not have shoulders and are easy to fill and easy to empty. And they're just so dang pretty. (We already said that, didn't we?!)

Can be used with the regular mouth Cuppow (shown), Ecojarz topper, reCAP and Mason Bar topper (shown)!

name: Ball Heritage Collection Blue Pint (16oz.) Mason Jar
description: We are going back to blue! As part of The American Heritage Collection celebrating the 100-year anniversary of the first Mason jar developed by the Ball Brothers, Ball has released a limited number of their classic pint-sized Blue jars. Delish General Store is proud to bring them to you! Why blue? From Wikipedia: "Most antique jars that are not colorless are a shade of aqua known as "Ball blue," named for the prevalent jar maker. Colored jars were considered better for canning use, as they block some light from reaching the food, which helps to retain flavor and nutritional value longer. " In addition to canning, these jars also are great for drinks, food and general storage (pantry, office supplies, etc.). We have even seen pictures of people using them for liquid hand soap in the bathroom or kitchen, and as vases for a lovely bouquet of flowers! Try our Daisy Lids combined with our paper drinking straws for a lovely retro drinking experience, or the awesome BPA-free Mason Bar with our stainless steel straw for the modern hipster experience! This size of jar works with our Daisy Lids, Cuppow, coin slots, the reCAP, the Ecojarz stainless steel topper, and the BPA-free Mason Bar topper. (Does not fit wide mouth lids or the wide mouth Cuppow.) *Flower images courtesy of customer Annie R., from Yarrow, B.C., who says, "One more photo! I’m in love with lilacs and blue ball jars. This photo is with the 2 new ball jars and the middle one is a real antique :) slightly more green than the full on turquoise of the new ones. All gorgeous!!" Thank you, Annie!

name: Pine Needle Basket
description:
We are delighted to introduce an ancient art from a modern day handcrafter. Pine needle basketry is said to date back some 9000 years, before pottery was even made.

This particular little beauty measures 1 3/4" high x 4 1/2" diameter. It would be handy to hold any sort of trinket or treasure in the bedroom or office, or even crackers or other snacks in the kitchen. We have several around the house and they stand up to daily (gentle) use, very well.

Each piece is one-of-a-kind and beautifully produced by Gail Nowakowsky, who is the mother of Delish General Store's proprietor and e-shopkeeper, Tamara Komuniecki. 

Check out our larger pine needle dish with a lid as well, and more beautiful items in the handcrafted category.

name: Soy Aroma Glow Candles by Feest
description:
Our absolute go-to candle for romantic dinners,  relaxing baths, into-the-wee-hours sewing and crafting sessions, Mad Men marathons and more. 

Choose from four masterfully-mixed scent blends. Each 6oz all-natural candle is made of 100% massage grade soy wax and pure essential oils, and uses a wick made of 100% lead-free cotton braid. Packaged in a German Weck canning jar which can be easily washed and reused after you've finished enjoying your candle, each candle burns for approximately 50-60 hours under normal conditions. 

ENERGIZING:
When you could use a little lift let the energizing blend of lemon and herbs perk your mind and spirit. Lemon has an unmistakably fresh and sharp citrus aroma and works to boost the immune system and cleanse the body. Eucalyptus, with its distinctive clear, fresh scent, has a soothing and calming effect that helps to detoxify the immune system. Basil's light, peppery and green aroma is used to 
clear the mind, while the refreshing herbal scent of rosemary is effective in the treatment of mental fatigue. 

SOOTHING:
The perfect combination of soothing flavors to engage your senses - just like a minty buttercream dream. The mouth-watering sweet aroma of vanilla generates an overall feeling of relaxation and comfort. Bergamot, renowned for its fruity and sweet aroma, is famously used to flavour Earl Gray tea and is known to boost mood and sooth the spirit. Japanese peppermint, with its fresh, sharp, menthol scent, aids in relieving mental fatigue and refreshes the spirit.

CALMING:
Close your eyes and imagine yourself in a lush field in Provence, the scent of lavender wrapping around you and herbaceous aromas soothing your spirit and lifting your tension. Lavender is renowned for its calming scent that has been proven to be effective in promoting sleep, relieving headaches and reducing stress. Basil oil is effective in relieving fatigue and headaches and encourages and sense of clarity.

BALANCING:
Release tension and embrace a moment of meditation with the clear, bracing scent of a West Coast forest. Cypress oil has a soothing effect on stress while rosemary stimulates your mental awareness. Eucalyptus boosts your immune response and the bright, clear aroma of spruce uplifts your spirit while complementing the earthy, grounding scent of oak moss.

name: STRAIGHT Glass drinking straws - Ice Tea/9.5mm diameter
description:
We just can't get behind single-use plastic anymore. Customers have been asking for them and we are so pleased to deliver! Our new glass drinking straws are from Glass Dharma, and are a wonderfully high quality product. 

Available in two lengths: 
ICE TEA 9.5mm x 6.25"/SMOOTHIE 9.5mm x 8" 
(9.5mm is diameter, which is 5.5mm inside diameter)

So, drinking from glass? Is that safe? Yes!
Glass straws don’t leach toxins into your food as you drink.

Glass Dharma glass drinking straws are:
*Made of borosilicate tubing and is the strongest glass commercially available.   
*Annealed to Corning, Inc. specifications (a process that strengthens the glass).
*Great for hot or cold drinks, microwave and dishwasher safe.
*Hand made in Fort Bragg, California.

name: BENDY Glass drinking straws - Smoothie/12mm diameter

name: Fabric tape
description:
You heard it here first, folks: fabric tape is the new washi tape!! 

What the heck is fabric tape? Pretty much exactly what it sounds like...fabric on one side, sticky on the other. Amazingly addictive to use, in crafting, scrapbooking, gift wrapping...anywhere you want to add a pop of color and texture!

We even use it to seal plain envelopes -- we can't stop!!

Size: 0.6 X 196 inches
Width: 1.50cm
Length: 500cm 

Colors available: 
Solids: sky blue, hot pink, coral, light pink
Dots: purple and coral, green and orange, blue and yellow, brown, green and orange
Grid: navy, sky blue, red, pink
Stripes: navy, sky blue, red, pink

Enjoy!!

name: mt washi tape
description: Have you heard of washi tape yet? It's ridiculous. And by ridiculous, we mean ridiculously GOOD...and addictive. (Don't say we didn't warn you.) It originates from Japan and is in a few words: rice paper masking tape. And, we now have the ORIGINAL and the BEST of the washi, made by mt Masking Tape from Japan. No more cheap knock-off tape that falls off the wall or only sticks for a day. This washi is also acid and lignin free, so suitable for your high quality archival works. We use it to seal or decorate packages (orders sent from our shop, birthday and Christmas presents and cards), to hang up our five-sheet-and-growing to-do list, and to hang photos and the kiddo's artwork on the wall. We are also fighting the urge to wrap everything in sight in it, because it's so cute and so satisfying to use! A lot of the colors coordinate with other crafting and party planning items in the shop. Make sure to check out our Pinterest washi tape board for more ideas (http://pinterest.com/delishgenstore/washi-tape) Colors available are: 1. cross light blue 2. drop red 3. spot yellow (confetti) 4. dot gold 5. dot red 6. dot green 7. dot black 8. gold 9. silver 10. shocking green 11. shocking red 12. shocking pink 13. stripe green A roll of washi tape measures just over 5/8" wide, and rolls out to be over 10 meters long of tape! (Yes, we are aware of that mix of standard and metric measurements there!!)

name: Washi tape - WIDE
description:
Have you heard of washi tape yet? It's ridiculous. And by ridiculous, we mean ridiculously GOOD...and addictive. (Don't say we didn't warn you.)

It originates from Japan and is in a few words: rice paper masking tape.

We use it to seal or decorate packages (orders sent from our shop, birthday and Christmas presents and cards), to hang up our five-sheet-and-growing to-do list, and to hang photos and the kiddo's artwork on the wall. We are also fighting the urge to wrap everything in sight in it, because it's so cute and so satisfying to use!

This is a brand new product in our shop - WIDE washi. It's about twice the width of a regular roll - measuring 30mm. We consider it twice as nice!

Make sure to check out our great selection of regular sized washi, and our Pinterest washi tape board for ideas on how to use these beauties: (http://pinterest.com/delishgenstore/washi-tape).

Colors available are red grid and grey airmail. We will be getting more of the wider washi in soon!

Wide washi tape measures just 30mm wide, and rolls out to be over 10 meters long of tape!

name: Washi tape sheets/stickers
description:
From Korean design company Livework comes 24 sheets of washi tape sticker goodness. Stripes and dots and plaids, oh my! (Also solids and metallics and more...)

We use it to seal or decorate packages (orders sent from our shop, birthday and Christmas presents and cards), to hang up our five-sheet-and-growing to-do list, and to hang photos and the kiddo's artwork on the wall. We are also fighting the urge to wrap everything in sight in it, because it's so cute and so satisfying to use! 

Equally addictive is making the sweetest little flags...I mean, how many flags does one family need? Still, try it. You'll see what I mean.

Product info:
Country of origin: Korea 
Sheet size: 
Width 3.5"/8.90cm
Height: 4.7 inches"/11.90cm

name: Kraft paper post-its - large (7.5x7cm/3x2.75")
description:
We have never seen these before, and we are pretty sure you haven't either - they're the best of both worlds: the chill of kraft paper with the convenience of a sticky note. 

The medium size sheets measure 7.5x7cm or 3x2.75", and there are 200 sheets per pad -- that's a LOT of reminders and love notes!

(We also have these in a medium size.)

name: Kraft paper post-its - medium (7.5x5cm/3x2")
description:
We have never seen these before, and we are pretty sure you haven't either - they're the best of both worlds: the chill of kraft paper with the convenience of a sticky note. 

The medium size sheets measure 7.5x5cm or 3x2", and there are 200 sheets per pad -- that's a LOT of reminders and love notes!

(We also have these in a larger size.)

name: Smile Tabs
description:
The most adorable sticky notes you'll ever find! These are designed by JStory and come from Korea. 

Cute to use as bookmarks and some even feature a small writing area. Tuck one with a happy note in your child's lunch or to return a book you borrowed!

*Pad size - 5 X 8.5cm (1.96 X 3.34 inches) 
50 sheets 

8 different styles to choose from:
owls
frogs
kitty cats
bears
bees
penguins
bunnies (including ninja bunny!!)
houses
NEW! chickens and ducks

name: Pennant/flag stickers
description:
These are adorable, and hard to come by! 

Make a sweet little flag or pennant with these stickers, use one as a beautiful tag on a gift, or find another original use for this unique seal. (And send a picture for our Hall of Fame photo album!)

Choose from white, light pink or kraft (or two of each) -- you will receive 4 sheets with 6 stickers on each for a total of 24 stickers.

Feel free to order half pink and half kraft, just let us know in the notes section of the PayPal form!

name: Kraft labels (rectangle)
description:
There are so many uses for these great labels, you might want to place a few orders!

Their size is 2x3" and they are perfect for return address labels, home organization, scrapbooking and much more. As you can see in one of the photos, we use ours for our product labeling and packaging, and they also grace all of our jars in our pantry.

Be sure to send a picture of how you're using them for our Hall of Fame photo album!

20 labels for $4.

name: Starburst seals (Kraft)
description:
These make a sweet envelope seal or card embellishment, and are perfect for gift packaging. Bake some fresh cookies, put them in a nice glassine bag and seal with a starburst -- BAM!

We also like to use them to label spice jars!

10 for $4.

name: MADE WITH LOVE stickers
description:
These came about one recent day when I rolled up a baby quilt I made. Running late for the baby shower, I couldn't find my ribbon box, so I decided to stamp a pennant sticker with our MADE WITH LOVE stamp. Et voila, a new favorite sticker!

These are perfect for all of your handmade gifts, and will let the recipient know that they are getting something truly special.

Choose from white, light pink or kraft (or two of each) -- you will receive 4 sheets with 6 stickers on each for a total of 24 stickers.

Feel free to order half pink and half kraft, just let us know in the notes section of the PayPal form!

And hey -- make everything with love.

name: Heart stickers
description:
Sweet little heart stickers that are perfect to have in your crafting arsenal. Great as a seal for love notes, handmade cards and tags, scrapbooking, and anything else you can dream up.

Choose from kraft, buttercream yellow, light pink, bright pink, peach, pumpkin orange, red, moss green, blue, gold or silver (or one each of three colors) -- you will receive 3 sheets with 12 stickers on each for a total of 36 hearts.

Some of the heart stickers coordinate with our other products, like paper drinking straws, shipping tags, goody bags and twine. The gold and silver hearts work exceptionally well with our brand new metallic twine from Knot & Bow (being listed this week!)...see our new photo album (coming this week as well) for more ideas on how to use a few of our goodies together for a perfect party!

If you would like your order of three to be made up of more than one color, just let us know in the notes section of the PayPal form!

name: Make Everything With Love 11x17 print
description:
Wherever you display this heartwarming sentiment, the meaning behind the words is the same, and it's simple. It's what we at Delish Mag believe in -- if you are going to make something, make it with love. 

Hang it in the kitchen to infuse your cooking and baking with thoughts of love for all whom you are feeding. Hang it in your sewing or crafting room to inspire your projects. Hang it anywhere you want this lovely reminder!

Each poster is:
* 11" x 17" (full bleed)
* Printed on 100lb premium gloss FSC® Certified Recycled Stock
* Full colour digital output - printed with a Vegetable Soy Based Toner
*made with love :-)

Packaged in a sturdy kraft mailer with stiff fiberboard construction to provide rigid protection.

Shipping cost:
$8 to Canada and US, $10 elsewhere.
